document_data.name: Battle of Demarch's Fall
document_data.mainbody: The '''Battle of Demarch's Fall''' was a battle fought in the [[Halls of Demarch]] beneath the city of [[Tantras]] in [[the Vast]] between rival factions of [[Demarch's Alliance]], an alliance between [[beguiler]]s who served [[Leira]] and those who served [[Mask]].{{Cite web/Class Chronicles: Beguilers and Dragon Shamans|}}{{Cite web/Class Chronicles: Shadowcasters|}}

Events.Aftermath:
The survivors fled across [[Faer√ªn]], living in fear of revenge attacks and church agents seeking to learn or maintain their secrets, most never coming back. A few friendly ex-members, however, returned to the Halls of Demarch and reformed into the [[Demarch's Folly]] organization.

The Halls of Demarch, however, were left permanently filled with fog and haunted by [[undead]], shadows, and other monsters.
